item.title: PATH
item.description: score:52 Chances: Deloitte and UiPath announced an alliance expansion to accelerate the transformation of their clients’ businesses through AI-powered Intelligent Automation solutions for SAP implementations and operations. UiPath’s addressable market is rapidly expanding. Small investments generate big returns when stocks with great fundamentals go on sale.
